DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate dose-response OPC-12759 ophthalmic suspension dry eye patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Outpatient . 2 . Subjective complaint dry eye present minimum 20 month . 3 . Primary ocular discomfort severity moderate severe . 4 . Corneal conjunctival damage moderate severe . 5 . Unanesthetized Schirmer 's test score 7mm/5minutes less . 6 . Best correct visual acuity 0.2 good eye . 1 . Presence anterior segment disease disorder associate keratoconjunctivitis sicca . 2 . Anticipated use topicallyinstilled ocular medication patient discontinue use study . 3 . Anticipated use contact lens study . 4 . Any history ocular surgery within 12 month . 5 . Female patient pregnant , possibly pregnant breast feeding ; 6 . Known hypersensitivity component study drug procedural medication . 7 . Receipt investigational product within 4 month .
